ind = 0
va = []
for ri in range(self.n_row):
    ha = []
    for ci in range(self.n_col):
        ha += [Item(name=self.mlab_names[ind], style='custom', resizable=
            True, show_label=False, editor=SceneEditor(scene_class=
            MayaviScene))]
        ind += 1
    va += [HGroup(*ha)]
view = View(VGroup(*va), resizable=True, height=self.height, width=self.width)
return view
